#summary features of the next release.

= In the next release (1.3.0) =

== @JMapAccessor ==

This annotation permits to define custom methods of "get " and "set":
{{{
public class Destination {

   @JMapAccessor(get = "countValue", set = "redefineCount")
   private Integer count;

   public Integer countValue(){ ... }

   public void redefineCount(Integer count){ ... }
}}}
